comments.raw_text: With the world going (and being for over a year) online this has probably changed from an 'enhancement' to a 'bug'. The ability to click an imported calendar event (Zoom, Teams, etc) is now mission critical for many companies. It can still be done via copy and paste (when you find the right part of the meeting message). Is the ability for the description of the event to recognise html / links very complex? I can programme in VB and it's quite straight forward. Happy to help.
